name: StarCat Mini
description:
Objective
Scan planets around a trillion stars to discover each of the 24 planet types.
If you're lucky, you might find artifacts of civilisations past.

Controls
Mouse to move
Hold right mouse button to look around
Left mouse button on things to click on them

Click on the Target Star button to get started.

Inspirations
Noctis
Christine Love's now-defunct Interstellar Selfie Station

My submission for the 24th Mini-Jam.
